block_list.title: Video Tutorial
block_list.body: Learn how to fold an Origami Cat designed by Toshie Takahama. This origami model is simple yet detailed at the same time. Perfect for Halloween. I haven't made one of these full screen origami tutorials for while now. Leave a comment and let me know if you prefer this format or my origami shorts. Liking both is a valid answer. Enjoy!!! Thanks for watching! Wilson Lee @Heap Art

block_list.title: More Designs from Toshie Takahama
block_list.body:
• Cat by Toshie Takahama
  • Yacht by Toshie Takahama
